taskGroup.name: Create a VDB to access two different sources
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps to create a Teiid VDB which contains queryable views which access and join two different data sources.
To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically.
taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations, you have successfully created and tested your VDB!

task.name: Create a Teiid Model Project
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create and set up your Teiid model project.

task.name: Create a Model from a Flat File Source
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how create a view table from flat file table data stored in CSV format.

task.name: Create a Model from a JDBC Source
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create source tables from your JDBC data source

task.name: Create joined view of the data sources
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create a view table which joins data from both of your data sources..

task.name: Create and test your VDB
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create a VDB as well as how to quickly deploy and test queries against the VDB.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created and tested your VDB!
